entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
